website_summaries.verdict: Although the blade is shorter than that of some other choices, these are versatile scissors that can be used on heavy carpets and in awkward cutting situations (thanks to the angled blades).
pros: Angled blades, spring-loaded handle, and high-quality stainless steel make for an excellent product
cons: May require more hand strength than some users would like to exert

customer_reviews.title: Sshhiiiiing! is the sound of my CANARY Arm Wrestler Carpet Scissors!
customer_reviews.text: Where have you been my entire life?! These are glorious. I can cut *anything* with these. I got them for carpet, but have found they are just all around useful to have. They're strong, they're sharp, and they're sort of shiny and pretty too... It's like a ninjato cutting through butter. Seriously though, if you find yourself in need of a well crafted, multi-purpose, super sharp cutting tool, I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: oddlyoily

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and strong (worked for my small hands)
customer_reviews.text: I had a shag area rug that was too big for the space. I bought these scissors and used them to chop off two feet of length. Then I used a hot glue gun on the back of the rug to keep it from unravelling. I have never used carpet scissors before, so I have no basis for comparison -- but these did the job, and I'm happy with the result. They seem to be sharp, and they allowed me to cut precisely. Also, I have small hands, and I was able to manage quite well with these.
customer_reviews.author: C Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cuts carpet well but tough on the hand
customer_reviews.text: My new area rug was smaller than the existing rug pad so the pad had to be trimmed. Scissors didn’t work at all because fibers were trapped where the two sides join thus preventing the blades to meet. I looked online for a more suitable tool and found these carpet scissors. The cutting ability is great but these are not ergonomic so your hand will still take a beating. I believe this product would be much improved if it had longer handles with a thicker grip for easier handling. I’d buy these again because the cutting ability is great but would have someone else use them for me.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT carpet scissors!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for very sharp, durable, easy to use scissors for cutting up thick wool carpeting. These are PERFECT! The flexible hinge located between the handles really helps facilitate easy cutting and prevents hand fatigue. I hope they continue to remain sharp, but they are helping me complete a tedious and time consuming job with a lot less aggravation. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bramwell

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick carpet
customer_reviews.text: These will not cut pile carpet, but work great on trimming the backing or other thinner pieces such as indoor/outdoor carpet.
customer_reviews.author: R Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: hard to cut a straight line
customer_reviews.text: these scissors seem to be reasonably well made but I don't understand why they are sold as "carpet" scissors as they didn't make cutting thin carpet tiles any easier than using a pair of kitchen scissors or others. and for trimming carpet i think you need a blade that is angled a little to the handle (i'm sure there is a term for that), which these are not. i found the images to be easy to think the blade was angled because of way they turn up, but they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Moore

customer_reviews.title: Quality snips for many uses
customer_reviews.text: These are quite heavy with a nut hinge you can tighten yourself. The angle makes them useful in odd situations. Earned a place on my at home but mystay in my carry kit for ease of locking. eBIS TRADING shipped them straight from Japan in 15 days.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: These do not cut well through thick carpet
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a bunch of different carpet cutting tools and decided to purchase this one. I didn't want to spend a ton of money on some industrial carpet cutter, but wanted to make my project a little bit easier (cutting carpet up from living room). This product is definitely not what I expected. I basically ended up using these scissors to cut a little bit through the middle of the carpet, just enough to get a grip on it and just ripped the carpet all the way down. These cut great through paper or thin pieces of material but not on something thick like carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Rositani

customer_reviews.title: Just an expensive pair of scissors
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT cut carpet. Does not work on anything thick. Would not cut cardboard box for recycling. Bought for use on carpet. Did not work for us the way other reviews claim.
customer_reviews.author: Maydaysmom

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR CARPET
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they showed people using them for artificial grass. Well, they don't work well at all!! They have minimal grip causing the handles to twist in your palm while trying to cut, which is hindered significantly because of the design, making it much to difficult to use on carpet lengths over six inches in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Daemon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on thick shag
customer_reviews.text: These shears cut through a thick shag rug. Yes, it took some work because it is a thick rug, but with some hand strength applied, the job got done. I had tried giant scissors, but I couldn't get those to work. These shears are strong and didn't suffer with the mega strength I had to apply to make the cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia R.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waist your money
customer_reviews.text: Can barely cut through my old carpet, they are the worst ever. Ended up using my old military Ka-Bar knife to cut the carpet, should’ve used my knife in the first place, knife went through the carpet like butter, the carpet cutter? Couldn’t cut your way out of a wet paper bag with them. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product broke upon cutting 5 inches of carpet. The spring popped off giving me a nasty sting. It also doesn't cut but 1/2 inch at a time. I ended up nicking the carpet with these and ripping the rest off with only my hands. I am extremely dissatisfied with these cutters!
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Not for deep pile
customer_reviews.text: I should have read closer. Although this is very sharp and the blades stay very tight, I had a hell of a time cutting the old carpet which was maybe deeper than this is designed for (about 5/8"). I'll keep it for other uses as it seems very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jasef

customer_reviews.title: It was so, so great... For the first hour
customer_reviews.text: These were an answered prayer and made life so much easier until they got jammed from carpet strings. I tried pulling them out, but I couldn’t get them all and I really, really tried. They still cut after that, but not nearly as well. I ended up using them as a grip on the carpet and just yanked with them to tear it (very old carpet).
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We bought some runners to put together to create one long rug for our long hallway. Unfortunately though the size of the runners was too long and we needed to cut. I was floored by how easy and effectively these worked. Whole thing was done in 25 seconds. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: jjjjordan

customer_reviews.title: Don't misuse, works great
customer_reviews.text: Cut all of my multiple pieces of carpet for an old classic truck. Worked great. Then I used it to trim some edging with metal inside. It worked, but now doesn't cut carpet as well. Foolish (normal).
customer_reviews.author: Sanguine

customer_reviews.title: Good size and cuts beautifully !
customer_reviews.text: Giving a 5 star rating because the scissors are very well made, sturdy but not too difficult to. Squeeze. I cut a dense oriental carpet with ease. As others have said in reviews, the trick is to NOT hang onto them at the end of the handles, but closer to the scissors end.
customer_reviews.author: S BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this scissors for work with para cord and they are great. These are a quality product that have exceeded my expectations. You can believe the projected delivery times because you are buying them from a Japanese company and the product is shipped from Japan. My purchase arrived just before the 4 week mark.
customer_reviews.author: M B Clendenin

customer_reviews.title: Great  Utility scissors to have around the house.
customer_reviews.text: Are use these to cut through artificial turf does a pretty good job I did get a blister while using them so I recommend having gloves on if you were cutting through something very thick one con is that they could be sharper however these are still a great pair of Utility scissors to have around the house.
customer_reviews.author: sensible

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not very sharp, and had to really squeeze hard to operate. Really hard on joints in hands to operate.
customer_reviews.author: marcia walden

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to cut through shag carpet with these.  Our gardening shears worked better.
customer_reviews.text: The scissors were comfortable to hold but after a few inches of trying to trim a shag carpet to a smaller size, it seemed to lose it's sharpness and was unable to handle the job. I will keep it to cut other thinks like thinner carpets or fabric but ended up using our garden sheers to cut the carpet that I orginally bought these for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuts rugs like buttah
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t believe this could work as well as it does. Easy on the hands, cuts like a dream. I’m in my 70’s with achy hands..., and NO problem. Did two big rugs by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Joycie

customer_reviews.title: Would not cut the carpet.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and as described. The product material quality and build were good. However, it would not cut the carpet without the blades sticking during the cut. I recommend the seller, but not the product.
customer_reviews.author: errico perrotta sr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and conquers the job
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly to trim a rug pad and easy to grip. The angled blade made it easy to get into bulky fabrics and I've already found other uses for it. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ravinia

customer_reviews.title: Made quick work of trimming a thick felt rubber-backed rug pad!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to trim a thick rug pad and decided to try these instead of a carpet knife. These scissors are fantastic - I could trim the pad safely and easily. I’m sure I will find other uses around the house, too. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: 2tejas

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Works well on most of my projects and carpet. I tried to use it on a thicker carpet and it was a little harder to cut so I will probably get bigger shears.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough to cut 1/4 rug pad
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it. Used this to cut 1/4" rug padding. Didn't work too well, was hard to cut. I'd recommend spending more money and getting something stronger
customer_reviews.author: Ravyn

customer_reviews.title: For more than carpets
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific scissors. I found them sharp, comfortable and easy to use, for crafts (foam and other materials), as well as making quick work of cutting up an old carpet that needed to be discarded.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on my rug
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to cut my rug to remove it from my home and it doesn't work to cut it. It seems sturdy but just not sharp enough for the rug.
customer_reviews.author: J. Woodworth

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Pretty strong. Was able to cut up my carpet with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Chinnonye O. Okafor

customer_reviews.title: work well - failry sturdy
customer_reviews.text: needed these to cut some new carpet pads...they worked well, have only used a few times - they're fairly sharp and study enough for the job...
customer_reviews.author: RM98104

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for cutting silk but not much else
customer_reviews.text: These do not cut carpet and they get stuck when you try to cut! I was disappointed to see that this item was an “Amazon’s choice” item.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Gret carpet cutter.
customer_reviews.text: Canary arm wrestler works as it says it would. I used it to cut a runner carpet that was about 1 inch thick. I had no problem cutting through it.
customer_reviews.author: diana domio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These work Great! I've tried several different cutting tools this is by far the best. I am installing thick carpet squares that have a thick rubber later on the bottom and these cut right through and my hands don't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for cutting heavy rug pad
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect these to work as well as they did. I have arthritis in my right thumb so scissors aren't that easy to use. I didn't have any problem cutting heavy rug pads with these, even 15-20 feet at a time. Great scissors for the job.
customer_reviews.author: mbjinala

customer_reviews.title: I did not feel they worked!
customer_reviews.text: They did not cut my small carpet mats well at all, disappointed. Read reviews, did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sady

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I tried every tool I owned to cut my heavy-duty rug pad. Even garden shears didn't work. But these scissors made quick work of the job.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Guendel

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Better than I hoped! Cuts carpet pad with ease. So excited to use for other things too 🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: svk

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t cut the carpet I ended up using scissors
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Waterman

customer_reviews.title: Not like
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t use these at all. I am left handed but not sure that is why they didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.author: Dwight E. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: It was like cutting through butter
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about ordering these carpet scissors as I have weak wrists and find it difficult to use scissors that aren't sharp. But after reading some of the reviews I decided to give them a chance. I couldn't believe it. It was like cutting through butter!! So easy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Wade

customer_reviews.title: Not for carpet
customer_reviews.text: For thin carpet like the indoor outdoor type should do, both nothing meaty, metal is thin and they didn’t work well in a woven carpet
customer_reviews.author: Jodicia

customer_reviews.title: Works on other things than carpet
customer_reviews.text: I us the ahears for plastics modifications. The tight fitting sharp blades, and the angled design work perfectly in my application.I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: W. OConnor

customer_reviews.title: WORKS SMOOOOOOOOTH
customer_reviews.text: It took me a try or two to get the feel of it, but once I did it cut a rug like buttah. Snazzy.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great job it makes cutting carpet easy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut carpet for my boat really good value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lege

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be sturdier
customer_reviews.text: A fairly good tool which needs to be sturdier. It did the job adequately but may not last the next use.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Great Shears!!
customer_reviews.text: These shears are just what I was looking for. They cut carpet like it was paper. I totally recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Good for cutting carpet that is on the thinner side
customer_reviews.text: Good for cutting carpet that is on the thinner side, I wish the blades will be twice as thick that will help with thicker carpets!!
customer_reviews.author: Marc E

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cutters!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and as described. High quality, durable and got the job done. Advice: wear gloves, prevents blisters.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Just eh
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first but lost its sharpness rather quickly
customer_reviews.author: Kermit Buchman Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Cuts like butter
customer_reviews.text: Great product for doing my job duties of destroying bad handbags
customer_reviews.author: J. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on our thick carpet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get rid of my old thick shag carpet and wanted to cut it in half to make it easier to handle and these scissors did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: These carpet shears are great! Just what I needed to cut a really ...
customer_reviews.text: These carpet shears are great! Just what I needed to cut a really good pad. Love them and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M DiMuro

customer_reviews.title: Get a utility knife instead!
customer_reviews.text: These don't really work for a big job like removing carpet. The scissors have to be "just so" to cut at all.
customer_reviews.author: MARY COLEMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great on carpet and fabric
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job on carpet, and now to my surprise, they are still sharp enough to use on fabric. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MsManners

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet shears!
customer_reviews.text: They work very efficiently. I effortlessly cut my carpet - not a problem. Good price and prompt delivery. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: ekgirl

customer_reviews.title: They are good for opening items sealed with hard plastics
customer_reviews.text: They are well made. They are good for opening items sealed with hard plastics. The offset angle of the handle to the blades help keep your hand away from the sharp plastic as you cut.
customer_reviews.author: L. Y. N.

customer_reviews.title: doesn't cut
customer_reviews.text: uh, it's a carpet scissor right? well, it doesn't cut carpet
customer_reviews.author: Desperado

customer_reviews.title: Better than any scissors I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to cut carpet samples. They worked on carpet but it was a struggle. Heavy duty scissors but they have limitations. Still a good tool to have in the tool box
customer_reviews.author: teresa H

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless. Had to get and use an old fashioned utility knife. Woll use these for cutting wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.author: Colliemom2

customer_reviews.title: Made of bad sleek cannot keep a edge
customer_reviews.text: This idiom is made to cut carpet but will not sharp enough the steel will not keep a sharp edge
customer_reviews.author: Ed Moreau

customer_reviews.title: Sharp scissors
customer_reviews.text: I liked the scissors, they cut through the pad for my carpet without problem. I don't know how long they will stay sharp but I have a lot of things I can cut now.
customer_reviews.author: Sue in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: worked
customer_reviews.text: needed to cut up an area rug. these worked, but hurt my hand after awhile. I would say these are great if you don't have too much to cut.
customer_reviews.author: Kellee C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for many things but not for cutting carpet
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why these are called "Arm Wrestler Carpet Scissors"... maybe because you have to wrestle the carpet while trying to cut it with these scissors?? Not good at all for cutting carpet, BUT I am keeping them because they cut many other things well (e.g. cardboard, plastic packaging).
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: These do the job!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to cut through a wool rug, and these worked great. I am so glad I took a chance and ordered these and I was able to use them as soon as they were delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Rac83

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Awesome Scissors!
customer_reviews.text: Highly Recommend! My husband used these to cut carpet. Worked like a charm! Like cutting through butter!
customer_reviews.author: Bermudabluez

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: Well the scissors work good but, I struggle sometimes with vehicle carpets and the isolation under the carpet is difficult to get into, otherwise to carpet is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: raul

customer_reviews.title: Good tool... worth the money
customer_reviews.text: as described and worked really well for cutting automotive carpet.
customer_reviews.author: rob barrett

customer_reviews.title: Not effective on thick carpet pads
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a number of new carpet pads I've purchased and a sharp box cutter works better. I had a blister on my palm before I was finished trimming a 8' length of carpet pad. They just aren't worth it for think pads, maybe for thin pads.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet scissors
customer_reviews.text: These scissors work great! Cut through carpet we are removing like butter. No dulling yet! Great product. Using them does not fatigue hands.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy56

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Struggled cutting through any thick carpet, just not very sharp I guess. Good design and felt good in the hand but left a lot to be desired. I switched to a utility knife and got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Sheron

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting results!
customer_reviews.text: Needed scissors that cut my office rug pad easily. I tried previously the household scissors and carpet knife - all failed but this was exactly what I needed. Clean cut. No effort at all trimming the pad to my rugs size. It was a few minutes project and I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: magic7

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cuts carpet
customer_reviews.text: We've Removed the carpet and pad in two rooms in 4 foot strips now and these scissors are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Crews

customer_reviews.title: works better than anything else I tried
customer_reviews.text: wished I would have bought them sooner. Makes the job cutting artificial grass a lot easier
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: These are a five-star purchase. Beautifully packaged, and shipped in record time. These scissors will cut absolutely anything.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Canary tool
customer_reviews.text: I gave negative feedback on this item earlier, that's because you said it had been delivered 2 days ago ,I just got the item. the negative feedback was your fault ,now that I actually have the item I'm well pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel Deason

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Did the job I needed to do cutting some faux grass outdoor carpet. Nice clean cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed. Used them for the first time today to cut up a carpet-the handle is slippery, I’m getting a blister and it is not cutting very well. Definitely not what I expected.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: pretty sturdy, was purchased to cut 60Mil TPO roofing membrane and they worked great.

customer_reviews.title: Great, sharp scissors!!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! They are really sharp and you'll be happy that you bought them, I used themt to cut up old rug and they worked perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use carpet scissors
customer_reviews.text: Canary carpet cutting scissors are easy to use and strong.

customer_reviews.title: Work fine for EPDM...
customer_reviews.text: Work fine for cutting EDPM for roofs. Makes the job easier with the offset blades and they are sharp enough to glide through the sheets on a straight slice.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I had to take carpet from an 8x10 room. These were dull after cutting one strip! I had to stop and sharpen after each cut. Waste of money!

customer_reviews.text: I have to usually re-adjust my cut to get it to cut clean over 2" or 50mm.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok

product_meta.title: CANARY Arm Wrestler Carpet Cutting Scissors Black (NAW-205B)
feature_bullets: [BEST CARPET SCISSORS EVER] The scissors is specialized in cutting and trimming carpet, wallpaper, denim, rubber sheet, leather, vinyl, cardboard, artificial grass. Helpful for your DIY and cut and resize these materials as you want.
[PRODUCT SIZE] Length: 8.07 inches / Blade length: 1.96 inches / Weight 0.286 lbs
[HEAVY DUTY SCISSORS] Blade: Stainless steel / Handle: ABS Plastic Japanese high quality Japanese stainless steel is used.
[JAPANESE QUALITY] Made in Japan. All item is hand made by professional Japanese craftsmen.
[OFFICIAL ENGLISH INSTRUCTION] Including CANARY official English instruction. Easy to use.
